name: portainer
tagline: A management interface for Docker and Kubernetes environments
description: Portainer is a self-hosted management UI for Docker, Kubernetes, and container environments. It simplifies container deployments, monitoring, and orchestrating services across endpoints.

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Deploy, start, stop, and remove Docker containers through a web interface

features.title: Kubernetes Ready
features.description: Manage Kubernetes clusters with visual tools for deployments and services

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Deploy multi-container applications using Docker Compose or Kubernetes manifests

features.title: Image Management
features.description: Pull, push, and manage container images from registries

features.title: Volume Management
features.description: Create and manage persistent storage volumes for container data

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Define teams and roles with granular permissions for multi-user environments

features.title: Registry Management
features.description: Connect to multiple container registries including Docker Hub and private registries
